title: Blended Learning Design for Problem-Centered STEM Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of Basic Science and Engineering Principles and Digital Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Team project-centered operations for real-world problem-solving, including real-time data collection and analysis using digital devices.

learning_goals: Integrate knowledge from three or more STEM fields to solve real-world scientific problems.
Perform on-site data collection and analysis processes with over 80% accuracy using mobile technology.
Propose and receive evaluations for three or more creative solutions during team-based problem-solving processes.
Achieve at least 70% proficiency in formative assessment categories: process engagement, solution creativity, and collaboration skills.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
